name: Dark Space Pioneer
description:
Attention pilot!

Your mission objectives are as follows:

  • Shoot down as many enemies as possible
  • Navigate your aircraft with the analog thumbstick
  • Align the crosshair over the enemies to tag them
  • Fire your missiles with the O button and score points
  • Dodge missiles by quickly switching flight directions and score points

Warning: This is a PROTOTYPE which is likely to have bugs!

Created by:
- David Reichelt

Music: 
- Fast Anxiety - Jeremy Korpas
- Higher Octane - Vans in Japan

Sound FX:
- Noam Guterman
